attributes.action: award honours only to people who live in this country; and consider what effect the award of any specific honour may have on the people of this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If people can't even be bothered to live in this country why should they be entitled to honours awarded by the country?  Also; honouring very controversial people, whose work may be considered as provocative by some sections of society, should be considered very carefully especially if it may put the people living here in danger from extremist elements.
